metadata.title: Yes They Are All Mine- Mom Humor- Mothers Day T Shirt
features: Solid colors: 100% Cotton; Heather Grey: 90% Cotton, 10% Polyester; All Other Heathers: 50% Cotton, 50% Polyester
Lightweight, Classic fit, Double-needle sleeve and bottom hem
description: This shirt was designed for all the Mama's out there that get stopped every few seconds in the grocery store or out in public, to be asked "Are these ALL your children?!" May they see your shirt and let you grocery shop much quicker before one of the many children in your cart have a melt down or throw a temper tantrum! :) The struggle is real. Every single week. This shirt comes in 5 colors and all sizes. Great for Mother's Day, Birthdays, Father's Day or Baby shower gift!
metadata.details: {"Package Dimensions": "10 x 8 x 1 inches; 4.8 Ounces", "Department": "mens", "Date First Available": "September 1, 2015", "Manufacturer": "MBDesigns"}
